meanings.definition: A person who habitually relies on or exploits others for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: The leecher always asks for money but never offers to help others.
meanings.sent2: She realized her friend was a leecher when he constantly borrowed things without returning them.
meanings.sent3: The leecher at the office always manages to get free lunches from his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The leecher's behavior drained the team's resources and goodwill.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the leecher who pretends to be generous but only takes advantage of you.

meanings.definition: A person who downloads files from the internet without contributing anything in return.
meanings.sent1: The leecher downloaded the movie without supporting the creators.
meanings.sent2: Online forums often struggle with leechers who don't share any content.
meanings.sent3: The leecher's computer was full of files they never paid for.
meanings.sent4: The leecher's actions deprived artists of their rightful earnings.
meanings.sent5: The leecher's hard drive was a graveyard of pirated software and media.
